general.name: Louay Guetat
aboutme: I am Louay Guetat, a passionate Full Stack Engineer with a strong background in computer engineering and a specialization in data science.
I excel at creating robust and user-friendly web applications, seamlessly blending front-end and back-end development with effective database management and API integration.
My experience spans data-driven functionalities, statistical analysis, machine learning, and natural language processing, allowing me to deliver innovative solutions tailored to complex challenges.
I thrive in dynamic environments, constantly seeking to learn and grow, and I am dedicated to bringing creativity and efficiency to every project I undertake.

experiences.title: Data Science Intern
experiences.description: Developed a data-driven solution encompassing end-to-end capabilities. Acquired business knowledge to guide project goals, utilized web scraping tools (Selenium and BeautifulSoup) to gather comprehensive datasets, and implemented Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) for efficient data indexing and retrieval. Integrated pre-trained HuggingFace models with LangChain and built a sophisticated multi-agent system using LangGraph. Designed and developed a responsive web application with ReactJS, seamlessly connected to a Flask-based backend via RESTful APIs to ensure robust communication and functionality.

experiences.title: Full Stack Intern
experiences.description: Developed a user-friendly job platform with ReactJS, streamlining applications for employers and seekers. Built APIs with Django and managed the database using PostgreSQL.

experiences.title: Software Developer Intern
experiences.description: Developed Java software to optimize market management and monitoring. Designed the JavaX application and created UML diagrams to support project structure and functionality.

works.title: EduMemes
works.description: An innovative educational application designed to make learning fun and engaging by leveraging memes and video edits to present information creatively.

works.title: Khedma.Site
works.description: Developed a user-friendly job platform with ReactJS, streamlining applications for employers and seekers. Built APIs with Django and managed the database using PostgreSQL.

works.title: SianaTech
works.description: Developed a showcase website for SIANATECH using ReactJS, highlighting their innovative technical solutions and services tailored for industries, hotels, and various sectors. The site effectively showcases their expertise in technical maintenance and facility management.

works.title: EsaElectronique
works.description: Developed a showcase website for ESA Électronique using ReactJS, effectively presenting their leadership in the Mauritanian market for household appliances, electronic systems, and solar energy solutions. The site highlights their extensive product range, competitive prices, and commitment to swift delivery and local market coverage.

works.title: CarthageBet
works.description: Developed a web application using ReactJS and NodeJS to manage user transactions, including account funding, and built an admin dashboard for monitoring partners, their transactions, and wallet balances.

works.title: Yoga Classifcation
works.description: CO-Developed a model for yoga pose classification using CNN architectures; a trained CNN achieved 86% accuracy, and ResNet attained 97% accuracy.

works.title: Intellectia
works.description: Co-developed an educational platform that transforms text-based math problems into engaging visuals using HuggingFace Pre-trained Models, featuring a user-friendly dashboard and interactive quizzes to empower children in assessing and enhancing their math skills.

works.title: PMBOK Recommendation
works.description: CO-Built a predictive system in chatbot format to create recommendations regarding risk management built on the data of the 11th edition PMBOK using a GAT GNN architecture, Bert embedder and NLP

works.title: Intelligent Chatbot
works.description: Developed a responsive web app with ReactJS and a Flask backend, integrating HuggingFace models via LangChain and LangGraph. Leveraged RAG for data retrieval, web scraping tools for dataset collection, and RESTful APIs for seamless front-end and back-end communication.
